timeline.message:
upgrade guava, CVE-2018-10237

Signed-off-by: David Karlsen <david@davidkarlsen.com>

timeline.author: reta

replies.bodyText: Here is the upstream JIRA to loosen the dependency range on Guava in opensaml - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SM-4353
replies.author: coheigea

replies.bodyText: Also, note that for WSS4J we need to add the following to the feature: install -s mvn:com.google.guava/failureaccess/1.0.1
replies.author: coheigea

replies.bodyText: Maybe this should be updated directly to 29.0?
replies.author: andrei-ivanov

timeline.message:
Upgrade to guava 29.0

Signed-off-by: David Karlsen <david@davidkarlsen.com>
